column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Last time I visited here I went ahead and picked a pre-set pizza. This time around
column2: I went ahead and customized it
column3: ensuring that it would come out hot and fresh from the oven. For those wanting to experience the goodness of the crust here
column4: this is the ONLY way to go. Order ahead of time if you mind the wait
column5: but just make sure its customized so you get the freshest
column6: hottest pizza. It makes all the difference.
